name: Chupacabra (itch) (Smumbo)
description:
Chupacabra is a top-down stealth game where you must traverse the levels while avoiding detection from the farmers.

Made in Unity for UA Game Dev's Spring 2018 Game Jam (theme: "Sonoran Desert")

No builds currently exist as this is a very old and buggy project that was never completed. Art assets and soundtrack are available, with full sample library and Ableton files used to make the soundtrack as well.

Credits

Jonah Venglarcik: Music

This itch.io page was created by Jonah, who suffers from memory loss, so the other contributors of the project have been lost to time. Please contact if you worked on this project and would like to be added to the credits.
